hero.description: The mission of this site is simple: To give you an easy and fun way to explore what is being said and done in Parliament, so that you can better hold your representatives accountable. Although the official Hansards have always been published promptly after a sitting, we know that reading a PDF isn’t the most accessible way of exercising your right to information and transparency. This site is our attempt to change that - we hope it helps you become a more informed voter!

search_mp: Search for an MP or party
search_keywords: Search for any keywords or phrases!
search_mps: Search for any demographic of MPs
invalid_date: Please enter a valid date. The field is incomplete or has an invalid date.
today_or_earlier: Date must be today or earlier.
timeseries_mp: Timeseries of total words spoken by {{ mp }} in {{ house }}
timeseries_mps: Timeseries of total words spoken in {{ house }}
